text: Bernadette Therese "Bernie" Nolan (17 October 1960 - 4 July 2013) was an Irish actress, singer, and television personality. She was known for being part of the Irish girl group The Nolans. Nolan was born on 17 October 1960 in Dublin, Republic of Ireland. She was raised in Blackpool, Lancashire, England. Nolan was married to Steve Doneathy from 1996 until her death in 2013. They had a daughter. Nolan died on 4 July 2013 from breast cancer in Surrey, England, aged 52. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1960 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Dublin Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish pop singers Category:Irish television actors Category:Musicians from Blackpool Category:Singers from Dublin Category:Singers from Lancashire
title: Bernie Nolan
